field.name: DESCRIPTION
field.value: #ID# - ID #ADMIN_EMAIL# - EMails of workflow administrators #BCC# - Emails of the users which have already modified the document some time or which can modify it #STATUS_ID# - status ID #STATUS_TITLE# - status name #DATE_ENTER# - date of document creation #ENTERED_BY_ID# - ID of the user that created document #ENTERED_BY_NAME# - name of the user that created document #ENTERED_BY_EMAIL# - EMail of the user that created document #FILENAME# - full file name #TITLE# - file title #BODY_HTML# - document contents in HTML format #BODY_TEXT# - document contents in TEXT format #BODY# - document's content stored in database #BODY_TYPE# - type of document contents #COMMENTS# - comments
